PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Picks up ore extracted by the hand drill.
PluginData.Description:
Picks up ore extracted by the hand drill.
Works both in creative and survival. Works both in offline and online multiplayer worlds.
The plugin is configurable via chat commands: /pickup help Prints this help on usage /pickup info Prints the current settings /pickup on Enables the plugin /pickup off Disables the plugin /pickup ice Toggles picking up ice /pickup stone Toggles picking up stone
The plugin disables itself if a conflicting mod is detected.
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
Please consider supporting my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/semods
One time support via PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/vferenczi/
Thank you!
